text:
To: Fellow Broadcasters
From: Frank E. Schooley, Treasurer* N.A.E.B.
He0 THE JEFFERSONIAN HERITAGE pressings.
It Is with deep regret that I transmit the word that we
have had unavoidable delays in pressing the series of 13 programs.
Our New York office advised me this morning that the series
is now In pressing process and all orders will be filled no
later than the last week in Decembero
I apologize to you for the delay. My previous word was based
upon our intentions and expectations0 1 had no way of knowing
about unexpected delays,,
